item.description:
Let's get together and play improv games. If you have any ideas for game you like to play let me know, otherwise I'll come armed with a few. I am fan of games of tag where every on is "it," and the "who's line is it any way" variety of games. I like singing improv games as well, but I am more then willing to follow your lead.

The event will definitely be held on the forth floor of the porter exchange building-- hopefully in one of the Dance Studios. I think room 414, but I will post it on the bulletin board near the security desk. Feel free to call me, if you get lost or if you have any questions.

I look forward to seeing you on Wednesday.
item.name: Improv and acting games
